member.summary: Settings for the entire Framework

member.summary: Default Framework Settings used when they are not provided

member.summary: Current OMOD version, Default is 4

member.summary: Current version of the Oblivion Mod Manager, Default is 1.1.12.0

member.name: P:OMODFramework.FrameworkSettings.CodeProgress
member.summary: Progress reporter for compression and decompression of SevenZip archives.

member.name: P:OMODFramework.FrameworkSettings.Logger
member.summary: Logger to use. Default value is an internal FileLogger that will create a OMODFramework.log file. Can be set to null if you don't want any logging at all.

member.name: P:OMODFramework.FrameworkSettings.ScriptExecutionSettings
member.summary: Settings only used during Script Execution

member.name: T:OMODFramework.ScriptExecutionSettings
member.summary: Scripts only used during Script Execution

member.name: M:OMODFramework.ScriptExecutionSettings.VerifySettings
member.summary: Verify your ScriptExecutionSettings. Do note that this will throw Exceptions on purpose if it finds bad settings to make sure to use try/catch or other Exception logging methods.

member.name: M:OMODFramework.ScriptExecutionSettings.VerifySettings(OMODFramework.ScriptExecutionSettings)
member.summary: Verify your ScriptExecutionSettings. Do note that this will throw Exceptions on purpose if it finds bad settings to make sure to use try/catch or other Exception logging methods.

member.name: P:OMODFramework.ScriptExecutionSettings.OblivionINIPath
member.summary: Absolute path to the oblivion.ini file

member.name: P:OMODFramework.ScriptExecutionSettings.OblivionRendererInfoPath
member.summary: Absolute path to the RendererInfo.txt file

member.name: P:OMODFramework.ScriptExecutionSettings.ReadINIWithInterface
member.summary:
If this is set to true: IScriptFunctions.ReadOblivionINI will be called so you can handle the reading of the oblivion.ini file the way you want.
If this is set to false: Internal functions will be called to read the ini file, this requires to be set to the oblivion.ini file
Default is true

member.name: P:OMODFramework.ScriptExecutionSettings.ReadRendererInfoWithInterface
member.summary:
If this is set to true: IScriptFunctions.ReadRendererInfo will be called so you can handle the reading of the RendererInfo.txt file the way you want.
If this is set to false: Internal functions will be called to read the file, this requires to be set to the RendererInfo.txt file
Default is true

member.name: T:OMODFramework.Logging.LoggingLevel
member.summary: Logging levels. Lower values mean more verbose output.

member.name: F:OMODFramework.Logging.LoggingLevel.Debug
member.summary: Lowest value. This is very verbose and will even report on every function call during script execution.

member.name: F:OMODFramework.Logging.LoggingLevel.Info
member.summary: Default value.

member.name: T:OMODFramework.Logging.ILogger
member.summary: Interface for a custom Logger

member.name: P:OMODFramework.Logging.ILogger.LowestLevel
member.summary: Lowest level that will be reported. won't be called if the level of the log is below this LowestLevel.

member.summary: Log a message

member.summary: Extracts the given file from the OMOD to a specified output location. If the output already exists but has different lengths than the file to be extracted, it will be deleted. The directory will also be created for you.
